Name: Furry Chronicles
About the game: Furry Chronicles is a classic platformer game with challenging levels and puzzles. Go on an adventure to save your friends from trouble by completing levels set in different environments, filled with various traps and puzzles. Hand-crafted levels with many surprises and different uses of the game mechanics will test your reflexes and problem solving abilities! Unlock other playable characters by rescuing your friends throughout the game and add replay value to your experience.
